page.title: 20Alison Serby's School Day
page.content: At 7.30 the radio comes on and wakes me up.I get dressed and have my breakfast then at 8.30 Joanne and Emma come round and we walk to school. We walk in the playground for the bell to go.The bell goes at 9.00. We go in and hang our bags up then we have assembly. After assembly we have project till 10.30 which is playtime. we usually play French elastic or chase. The bell goes at 10.55 and we have Fletcher Maths. At 12.00 we have lunch and a break till 1.00. Then we go swimming at the Clere School. The water is very cold. When we come back from swimming we have playtime from 2.15 to 2.35. After play we do project again till 3.30 then school ends and we go home.
